_sText:
***********************************

     CHURCHES X  **  gg_churches_x

***********************************

******************

It's on my server:
72.26.102.140:27015

******************


gg_churches_x
by Jeremy "Air" Hurley
hurley@cox.net



   This map was released on 4/29. I made this map
in approximately 3 days. I made it because the
other gg_trs_churches map was so popular but at
the same time it had the potential to be so much
better.

   I didn't like the dulled-down colors of the
original churches and also knew it could use alot
more detail to the environment. I also knew that
there were other improvements I could make to add
to the fun, and those are listed below.



NEW FEATURES
-----------------

** A bomb site in the middle of the map!
** Windows in the interior walls for more action!
** New interior high platform inside each church!
** Shallower, more realistic underground areas!
** Trees, bells, more gravestones, etc.!
